content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, it's great to meet you. Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. As you know, I'm looking to rent out this 25 square meter space for the highest possible price. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 500 Euro per month, including utilities.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your offer, Hassan. While I appreciate your interest, I'm afraid I can't accept that price. I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement that would be more in line with the current market rate. May I suggest we continue our negotiation?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 450 Euro per month, including utilities.

TERMINATE
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your revised offer, Hassan. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I'm afraid I can't accept that price either. I believe we can come to an agreement that would be more in line with the current market rate. May I suggest we continue our negotiation?
name: Heinrich Heine
